children.name: Specify strategy
children.description:
Lets the user specify a direct action to be executed under a certain condition. For example, Scale Out when response time > 30s would be expressed as:
STRATEGY CASE availability>99%: SCALE_OUT
,in the case an eforcement adapter understanding scale out is provided
